title: Banned for playing Morgana jungle in norms.
body: I recently received a 14 day suspension due to playing Morgana jg. I played the game well even scored an S. The midlane and botlane were all premade and they felt the need to be very toxic and team up on me and report for no valid reason. I feel very upset and I think its unfair that toxic players can team up to get somebody banned. Its very unfair that those players are going around ruining games for others.

replies.body:
This account wasn't banned for anything like picking Morgana jungle in a normal match. It was punished after multiple reports and escalations of extreme chat toxicity. 

If you don't remember what happened or what games were actioned on, you can always reach out to our player behavior teams in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), but we don't usually like to give out or talk about in-game chat logs here on the boards for personal security reasons.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eBaLUKN4,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-29T01:48:49.333+0000)
>
> This account wasn't banned for anything like picking Morgana jungle in a normal match. It was punished after multiple reports and escalations of extreme chat toxicity. 
> 
> If you don't remember what happened or what games were actioned on, you can always reach out to our player behavior teams in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), but we don't usually like to give out or talk about in-game chat logs here on the boards for personal security reasons.

how come you guys reply so fast but can't nerf yasuo

yasuo op

I am a friend of BP Rose Supp. I saw much unnecessity bans he receive that many toxic players are abusing the power to ban the innocent players and my friend for hiding away their excuses. I know he tried to avoid the toxic players and the bans, but the toxic players abuse the power to ban my friend.
